title: Serious question 2, more autistic than the last one
body:
What do people even do with a bf/gf, aside from the obvious?

Like, the two go out, they change their status on fb, they do the nasty nasty, and then what? Do they just randomly hang out again every day or something? I legitimately don't get it. 

For example, I have friends, right? It's shocking, but I do. We go out (not like that) like once a month or something, catch up on shit, have a few drinks, and then go home.
But like, what are you supposed to do with a gf? Seeing her once a month doesn't seem right, but neither does senselessly going out to see her everyday for no reason.

Pls respond.
